docs.name: Foreman
docs.info: Foreman API v2 is currently the default API version.

methods.name: index

apis.short_description: List all operating systems for nested architecture
List all operating systems for nested medium
List all operating systems for nested partition table
List all operating systems for nested provisioning template
List all operating systems for nested provisioning template

params.name: password_hash
params.description: Root password hash function to use, one of MD5, SHA256, SHA512, Base64

params.name: architecture_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: config_template_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: provisioning_template_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: medium_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type

params.name: ptable_ids
params.validator: Must be an array of any type
